verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We are the Church
the chosen bride of Christ

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We have the imprint of His cross up on our lives
The highest price was paid

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
when the Lamb of God was made
The perfect and most holy sacrifice

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
We have one purpose (one mission)
one reason to remain

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
To raise the cross of Jesus
And magnify His name

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
We preach Christ
Who was crucified and risen from the grave

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
We preach Christ
The only One who has the strength to save

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
The message we proclaim is the power of His name
We preach Christ

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
We are the voice that cries the truth today
And of this truth we will never be ashamed

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
Tho'many doubters rise and reject the claims of Christ
God's unchanging Word will still remain

verse.name: v11
verse.lines:
We have this moment (this hour)
To seek and save the lost

verse.name: v12
verse.lines:
To speak the name of Jesus and point them to the cross
We preach Christ

verse.name: v13
verse.lines:
Who was crucified and risen from the grave
We preach Christ

verse.name: v14
verse.lines:
The only One who has the strength to save
The message we proclaim is the power of His name

verse.name: v15
verse.lines:
We preach Christ
So we lift the name of Jesus for all the world to see

verse.name: v16
verse.lines:
The message of salvation to all who will believe
We preach Christ

verse.name: v18
verse.lines:
We preach Christ
We preach Christ
We preach Christ!
